app.summary: Invite others to grab times on your calendar. Choose a date. Make appointments as easy as it gets.
app.title: Thunderbird Appointment

help.location: The URL or hostname we will use to connect to your calendars.
help.password: This is usually not your email address password, but an 'App Password'.
help.user: This is usually an email address.

calDAVForm.successfullyConnected: Successfully connected to CalDAV server. Waiting for calendar retrieval.

error.authenticationRequired: Sorry, this page requires you to be logged in.
error.calendarConnectError: There was a problem with the calendar connection.
error.externalAccountHasNoCalendars: Your {external} account contains no calendars. Please connect a different account.
error.generalBookingError: Sorry, there was a problem retrieving the schedule details. Please try again later.
error.googleRefreshError: Error connecting with Google API, please re-connect.
error.invalidTimeConfiguration: Please make sure the end time is at least {value} after the start and adjacent times are valid.
error.loginMethodNotSupported: Login method not supported. Please try again.
error.noConnectedCalendars: Calendar setup required. Connect a calendar to continue. {0}.
error.noSpecialCharacters: Please remove the special characters and try again.
error.routeNotFound: Sorry, this page could not be found.
error.selectOneDay: You need to select at least one day to continue.
error.unknownAppointmentError: There was an issue creating your booking. Please try again.
error.unknownScheduleError: There was an issue creating your schedule. Please try again.
error.usernameIsNotAvailable: Username not available. Please choose another.
error.weCouldntConnect: We couldn't connect to your calendar.

ftue.connectCalendarInfo: Connect your calendars to manage your availability
ftue.customVideoMeetingText: Use a single meeting link for all bookings from your selected provider
ftue.errorBody: Looks like there was an error. Click the button below to go back!
ftue.finishAltText: A user icon in front of two calendars.
ftue.finishScreenText: Before you close this screen, copy your shareable schedule link to start receiving appointments.
ftue.oneCalendarRequired: Please enable one calendar to continue
ftue.setupScheduleInfo: You can edit this schedule later

steps.finish: You are ready to start booking

ftue.usernameHelp: This will become your quick link
ftue.videoConnectionRequired: Connect your zoom account, enter a custom meeting link to continue.

info.bookedPleaseCheckEmail: This event has been booked. Check your email to add it to your calendar.
info.bookingLinkHasAlreadyBeenUsed: It looks like this link has been used.
info.bookingLinkIsInvalid: This booking confirmation link is invalid.
info.bookingModifiedSuccess: Request for confirmation has been sent to the booker.
info.bookingModifiedError: There was an error while modifying your booking.
info.bookingSuccessfullyDenied: Booking rejected. Reach out to the booker to recommend an alternative.
info.bookingWillBeCanceled: Booking will be canceled. An update will be sent to the booker.
info.cancelServiceInfo:
To cancel your Appointment service, click here:
 Note: This will not affect your TB Pro account or subscription.
info.downloadAccountData: To download all the data being used by the Appointment service, click here:
info.invitationGenerated: The invite codes were generated successfully.
info.invitationWasSent: An invitation was sent to your email.
info.messageWasNotSent: Your message couldn't be sent. Please try again.
info.messageWasSent: Your message has been sent to our support team.
info.slotIsAvailableAgain: Time slot now available for bookings.

label.automaticallyConfirmBookingsIfTimeIsAvai: Automatically confirm bookings if time is available
label.autogenerateZoomLinks: Auto-generate and include Zoom link in invites
label.columnHeadersSortable: Column headers with buttons are sortable
label.customizePerDay: Set custom times for each day
label.enterEmailToInvite: Enter an email to invite them to Thunderbird Appointment:
label.enterDescriptionToSchedulingPage: Enter a description to appear on the scheduling page
label.inviteCode: Invite Codes | Invite Code | Invite Codes
label.name: Name
label.pendingBookingRequests: pending booking request | pending booking requests
label.scheduleCreationError: There was an error creating your schedule. Let's try that again.
label.sendInviteToWaitingList: Select someone to send an invite! | Send an invite to {count} folk | Send an invite to {count} folks
label.sentCountInvitesSuccessfully: All selected users are already invited! | Sent {count} invite! | Sent {count} invites!
label.title: Title
label.waitingListUser: Waiting List Users | Waiting List User | Waiting List Users
label.whatDoYouWantToDoToday: What do you want to do today?

intro: Please confirm your email to join our waiting list.
Check your inbox for more information shortly.
confirm.title: Complete your sign up

form.no-invite-code: If you don't have an invite code, add your email to our waiting list.
form.privacy: Your privacy is important to us.

login.title: Sign in or create an account

remoteError.email-mismatch: The email you've signed up and logged in with must be the same as your Mozilla Account.
remoteError.email-not-in-session: There was a problem with the login session. Please try again.
remoteError.invalid-credentials: There was a problem with your credentials.
remoteError.invalid-state: The login session has expired. Please try again.
remoteError.invite-not-valid: The invite code you've entered is not valid.

signUp.title: Have an invite code? Enter it here

waitingListSignUp.title: Enter your email to join the waiting list

betaWarning.heading: As we're currently in beta, we do have some issues we're dealing with:
list: Please check your spam folder as some emails might end up there
If Zoom meetings don't appear in your appointment invite, please disconnect and reconnect your zoom account in the {connectedAccounts} section of the settings
If you experience other issues, please use the {contactUs} form, or join us on our {matrixChannel}

placeholder.bookingNotesPlaceholder: Add any notes you'd like to include with your reply

text.accountCancelWarning:
You will no longer have access to TB Appointment. All booking calendars will be set to "Inactive" and all upcoming bookings will be cancelled.
Other appointment data will be retained for 30 days, in accordance with the TB Pro Privacy Policy.

admin.completelyRemoveUser: This will completely remove a user from Thunderbird Appointment, including all of their user data. Don't do this unless you're told to.
admin.disableAccountFirst: You must disable the account first.

text.calendarDeletionWarning: Removing this calendar will remove all appointments and schedules from Thunderbird Appointment. Any confirmed events currently stored in your calendar will not be removed.
text.connectZoom: Connect your Zoom account to generate instant meeting invites for each booking.
text.contactRequestForm: Please use the contact form below to send any feedback, questions, or concerns to our support team. If needed we will try and contact you for further information as soon as possible.
text.defineDaysAndTimeSlots: Choose the days and time this event can be booked.
text.denialSentToAddress: We've let the booker ({address}) know you can't make this event.
text.disclaimerGABooking: Your booking will be confirmed by the calendar owner.

generateZoomMeetingHelpDisabled.text: Zoom is not connected. Please {link} to use this feature.

text.googlePermissionCalendarName: See and download your calendars using Google Calendar
text.googlePermissionCalendarReason: Thunderbird Appointment requires this permission to display a list of calendars you can connect with.
text.googlePermissionDisclaimer: Thunderbird Appointment requires the following permissions from Google Calendar for optimal functionality.
text.googlePermissionEventReason: Thunderbird Appointment requires this permission to add bookings to your connected Google Calendars.
text.googlePermissionEventsName: View and edit events on all your calendars

homepage.calendarCopy: Connect your calendar and see all your meetings in one place. Book one-off or recurring events and invite people to join you.
homepage.copywrite: Thunderbird is now part of {mzlaLink}, a wholly owned subsidiary of Mozilla Foundation. Portions of this content are ©1998–2025 by individual contributors. Content available under a {creativeCommonsLink}.
homepage.intro: Thunderbird Appointment makes it easy to find a time to meet. So you can ditch the admin and streamline your day.
homepage.planEventBody: With multiple ways of organising and setting up meetings.
homepage.scheduleCopy: Need to organise a meeting with a client? We’ve got you covered. Send them your general availability and stop the calendar juggling.
homepage.screenshotCalendarAlt: A screenshot of Thunderbird Appointment's calendar page.
homepage.screenshotScheduleAlt: A screenshot of Thunderbird Appointment's schedule page.
homepage.setAvailabilityBody: Choose when and how people can book time with you.
homepage.shareWithOthersBody: Send your personal link via email, or add it to your website.

text.invalidOrAlreadyBooked: The booking slot might not be available anymore or the link is broken.
text.invitationSentToAddress: An invitation for this event has been emailed to {address}.

login.continueToFxa: Enter your email above to continue to Mozilla Accounts

text.ownerNeedsToConfirmBooking: When this option is active, you will be required to confirm or decline times booked on your schedule. When this option is deactivated, all times will automatically be confirmed.
text.preferredEmailHelp: Set the email you'll use for out-going communication. This will be used in calendar events and emails.
text.recipientsCanScheduleBetween: Recipients can schedule a {duration} appointment between {earliest} and {farthest} ahead of time.
text.refreshLinkNotice: Saving will change your schedule's link. Any old links will no longer work.
text.requestInformationSentToOwner: Information about this booking request has been emailed to the owner.

scheduleSettings.clickHereToConnect: Click here to connect a calendar!
scheduleSettings.create: Select a calendar under Scheduling details and click save to get started!
scheduleSettings.noCalendars: Scheduling requires at least one connected calendar.
scheduleSettings.notActive: Schedule is not active, turn on the toggle to edit or share.

connect.caldav: You can connect to a CalDav server and pull its associated calendars.
connect.fxa: This is the account associated with your login. If you delete your Mozilla Account your data with Thunderbird Appointment will also be removed.
connect.oidc: This is the account associated with your login. If you delete your Thunderbird Pro account your data with Thunderbird Appointment will also be removed.
connect.google: You can connect your Google account to access your calendars. Disconnecting your account will remove your calendars, and associated data.

googleLegal.link: Google API Services User Data Policy
googleLegal.text: Thunderbird Appointment use and transfer of information received from Google APIs to any other app will adhere to {0}, including the Limited Use requirements.

connect.zoom: You can connect your Zoom account to enable instant meeting invites with your appointments.

caldav.message: Disconnecting from your CalDAV server will remove all associated calendars and data from your Thunderbird Appointment account. If your schedule is setup with a CalDAV calendar then it will be turned off until you set it to a new calendar.
caldav.title: Disconnect CalDAV

google.message: Disconnecting your Google account {googleAccountName} will remove all available Google Calendars and associated data from your Thunderbird Appointment account. If your schedule is setup with a Google Calendar then it will be turned off until you set it to a new calendar.
google.title: Disconnect Google account

zoom.message: Disconnecting your Zoom account will disable the ability to generate Zoom meeting links on bookings. Any existing meeting link will be unaffected.
zoom.title: Disconnect Zoom

calendars.noCalendars: No calendar accounts connected. Add an account to get started.

text.timesAreDisplayedInLocalTimezone: Times are displayed in your local timezone {timezone}.
text.updateLinkNotice: Changing your username or slug will change your link. Your old link will no longer work.
text.videoLinkNotice: Video link will use the same link for all events created in this general availability. Generating zoom meetings will create a new zoom link for each event created.

waitingList.adminInviteNotice: Notice: The Send button will not re-invite people already accepted, but you can still select them. Use the filters for clarity!
waitingList.confirmInfo: You'll receive an invitation as soon as registration opens.
waitingList.errorHeading: There was a problem with that link
waitingList.errorInfo: Unfortunately this link is expired or is invalid.
waitingList.leaveHeading: You’ve been removed from the waitlist
waitingList.leaveInfo:
Your email has been successfully removed from our waitlist.
If you change your mind, you can always rejoin.
marketing: Own your calendar, share your time.
Thunderbird Appointment simplifies the way you find time to connect so you can soar past the planning, and get to the living.
waitingList.signUpAlreadyExists: You are already on the waiting list.
waitingList.signUpCheckYourEmail: Check your email for more information.
signUpInfo: Please confirm your email to join our waiting list.
Check your inbox for more information shortly.
